import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./product.css"; import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart" import {productData} from "../../dummyData" import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import MoivesReducer from "../../context/Moviecontext/MoviesReducer"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation() const [movies, setMovie] = useState(null); const movie = location.movie const handleChange = (e) => { const value = e.target.value; setMovie({ ...movies, [e.target.name]: value }); }; console.log(movies) return (

Movie

{ movie.title}
id: { movie._id}
Genre { movie.genre}
Year { movie.year}
limit {movie.limit }
); }
